course.title: PSY 3377 Cognition (3 units)
course.desc: Introduction to contemporary cognitive psychology. Origin of cognitive and symbolic processes. Historic foundations. Acquisition of various kinds of knowledge. Analysis of cognitive strategies. The course includes laboratory activities. Current research in cognition.Course Component: Laboratory, Theory and LaboratoryPrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2174. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours in psychology programs.
